cards.title: Zero brokerage fee
cards.text: Our advisory and brokerage services are free when you invest in off-plan properties. You receive full, end-to-end support — from analysis to negotiation — without paying a brokerage fee. For secondary properties, we charge a flat 2.1%, always transparent and without hidden costs.

cards.title: Data-Driven & Finance-Based
cards.text: We approach real estate like financial markets: with data, financial analysis, and risk control. Backed by backgrounds at [BCG, EY, and KPMG]

cards.title: Jay, CEO & Founder
text:
Dear investor,

Finding a good investment property in Dubai is hard. Really hard.

Most agents don't understand investing. They sell glossy brochures, AI pictures, and "luxury" buzzwords - but not numbers. No rental yield, no exit strategy, no risk analysis. For investors, that often leads to costly mistakes.

I founded Forever Estates to change this. With my background at EY and BCG, and a team with decades of real estate experience, we bring financial discipline, data, and transparency into every deal.

For you, that means:
No bad deals
The right price, negotiated
Confidence and a clear exit strategy

If you want your next Dubai investment to be backed by facts and data, book your free consultation today. Let's find the property that works for your portfolio.

— Jay Abrams, CEO
